name: Senior 3D Motion Designer (remote)
description:
Brane is a global marketing company based in Singapore. We help growth-stage products to build and execute user acquisition strategy. We are the trusted partner of 100+ leading companies as Facebook, eBay, Alibaba Group, King and others.

Now we are looking for a Senior Motion Designers to develop worl-class creative assets for digital and social ad campaigns.

This position can be based anywhere in the world (working remotely). It's not a 9-5 job. Expect to work at least 20 hours per week, including some mornings, evenings and an occasional weekend day.

What you’ll be doing:

  • Responsible for creating and editing animated marketing and advertising materials;
  • Create and maintain motion graphics-specific templates, instructions, documentation, and best practices;
  • Oversee productions from start to finish, beginning with initial concept and ending with final video deliverables.
  • Edit raw video footage and add effects/elements to enhance motion graphics.

What you’ll bring:

  • Highly skilled in creating motion graphics with Adobe After Effects;
  • Advanced 3D animation skills using Cinema 4D;

  • Mastery of supporting applications including Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

  • Competency in conceptualizing, planning, and managing animation and video projects.

  • Familiarity with shared storage and cloud-based collaborative workflows.

What you’ll get:

  • 100% remote work;
  • Flexible schedule;
  • Competitive compensation.
